aasiyawe awurudu 17ta adu yauwana yauwaniyan sadahawu maha krida mangalyaya milagata hambanthotadi pawathwen bawin chinayedi shri lankawata wishala piliganimak labi thibe.agamathi di.mu.jayarathna mahatha ha krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahatha eeye rathriye nanjin wetha paminimata niyamithawu athara owun samarambhaka ulele wishesha aaradhithayan lesa unusum piliganimakata katayuthu sudanamwa atha.jathika olimpik kamitu sabhapathi hemasiri pranandu ha hambanthota nagaradhipathi eraj rawindra pranandu yana mahathwaru wetha chinaye nanjin nagaradhipathi yan we seyi mahatha ha aasiyanu olimpik kamitu niyojithayan wisin olimpik dhajaya bharadimata niyamitha athara ethan sita wasara 2017 pawathwena krida ulela thek eya shri lankawata ayath we.dina 9k pura dakunu diga chinaye nanjin nagarayata aluth udawak ek kala aasiyanu yowun krida ulele samapthi ulela paya 2kata asanna kalayak pawathwimata katayuthu yoda athi athara ema sandarshanaye miniththu ataka kalayak shri lankawa wenuwen wen kota thibe.ema kalaya thuladi hambanthota kendra kotagath thathpara 30ka widiyo patayak ha udarata pahatha rata sampradayan sammishranaya karamin shri lankawe sanskruthika nirupanayak idiripath kere.
